Text: I needs that man...Plz seed guys... Thats some nice stuff...

When I try to install it in VirtualBox I can not continue when it shows the license terms. The next button is greyed out. (and yes, I did scroll the terms all the way down...).
what do i do wrong?

OK. It seems it works better in VMWare 8. There is doesn't show the license terms, but continues installing instead. GREAT!
